session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Colleagues, if you could please be seated so that we can begin.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thank you.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I call to order the first meeting of the Informal Ad Hoc Working Group.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: On behalf of the co chairs, I extend a warm welcome to all of you to this first meeting of the Informal Ad Hoc Working Group.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I would like to recognize the presence of the President of the General Assembly, Her Excellency Annalina Baerbock and Mr. Guy Ryder, under Secretary General Policy in the Executive Office of the Secretary General.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Madam President, in our role as Co Chairs of the Informal Ad Hoc Working Group, we congratulate you on your election and wish you a fruitful 80th session of the General Assembly.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: As members are aware in its decision 79571 of 2 September 2025, the General assembly decided to establish an Informal Ad Hoc Working Group open to all Member States and observers to consider options to improve the creation, delivery and review of UN mandates.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The establishment of this group is a milestone within the broader UN80 initiative, and new Zealand and Jamaica are honored to co chair its work.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Today we gather with a clear sense of purpose to take forward the mandate entrusted to us by the Assembly.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: In the spirit of cooperation, openness and trust that defines multilateralism at its best, our leaders have called for a United nations that is more effective, more efficient and fit for purpose.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: As it marks its 80th anniversary, this working Group is one expression of that collective ambition, and it is for us, the membership, to shape how that conviction is translated into practice.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We meet today to set out our understanding of the task before us and to engage with you on how we can best work together to complete it successfully.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: While we have some initial thoughts on how we might proceed, today is not about prescribing a roadmap.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: It is about listening, taking stock of your perspectives, and beginning to build a common understanding of the way forward.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Mandates derive from the will of Member States, and it is vital that all delegations have the opportunity to contribute.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We are therefore committed to proceeding in a manner that is fully open, transparent and inclusive, ensuring that the Working Group reflects the the broadest possible participation and ownership.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: At the same time, we are mindful of the Assembly's clear instruction that we must strive for consensus as we begin to prepare a program of work and plan our way forward.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We are eager to hear from you so that we can be sure that our proposed approach aligns with the needs and wishes of the membership.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We also recognize the many demands on delegations, particularly smaller missions, in the months ahead.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And for this reason we see value in beginning with a Discovery Phase A period of wide consultations to gather perspectives, to clarify priorities and to build shared understandings.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: This will allow us to develop a package of principles and follow up actions that could form the basis an agreed outcome.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: This phase will be fully open and inclusive and organized in a way that is sensitive to the competing demands on delegation's time.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We will also draw on the best data analysis and expertise available, including through active support from the Secretariat.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And we thank the Under Secretary General for his firm commitment in this regard.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: It is also clear to us that there are many outside the Working Group who wish to contribute ideas for our collective consideration.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We welcome this and will facilitate it as part of the Working Group process while preserving the Member State driven nature of our discussions.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We will aim to complete this phase in time to report back to the membership by the 15th of December in line with the Assembly's request, before moving into a production phase to finalize outcomes by March 2026.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: With that, I now pass the floor to Ambassador Schwargov for some additional comments.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thank you Ambassador Wallace and good morning everybody.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: President of the General Assembly Under Secretary General Guy Ryder and all of our colleagues.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: It's so great to see so many of you here this morning.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The General assembly has given us clear direction.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We are tasked with identifying principles and follow up actions to improve the creation, delivery and review of mandates.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The Secretary General's report on the Mandate Implementation Review provides a useful starting point for these discussions.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: It provides a number of proposed solutions and follow up actions for for implementation by the UN Secretariat in support of Member States.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We will invite the UN Secretariat to provide the Working Group with updates on implementation of those proposals that sit within their authority at appropriate moments during this process.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The report also proposes a range of actions that Member States could take to enhance mandate design, improve mandate delivery and support mandate Review as you engage in the Working Group, we would welcome your feedback on these proposals, focusing on those actions which you consider most important to progress and or those where Member States could achieve some quick wins.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We also understand that Working Group members will also have ideas of their own on concrete actions we can take beyond those proposed in the Report.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We encourage you to bring these to the consideration of this Working Group.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Let us also assure you that we have learned many lessons from the last mandate review almost 20 years ago.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: One of the key findings of that process was the impossibility of trying to have a Working Group such as this make judgments on individual mandates.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: As Co Chairs, we intend to focus our attention at the system level.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We will not be considering individual mandates in this Working Group.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Further, as Co Chairs, we think it will be important to focus on the future so that we can be more effective and efficient with with limited resources.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We want to hear from you what that future might look like.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: How can Member States, who are responsible for the adoption of mandates, be more effective and more efficient in future?

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: What principles should underpin how we work together as Member States to strengthen the impact of the United nations, to improve delivery across all pillars of of our work?

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And what principles should underpin our partnership with the Secretariat going forward?

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: As Co Chairs, we do not intend to prejudge what the outputs of the Working Group should be or what form these might take, although we can imagine a scenario where they might involve a combination of different elements.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: This is for the Working Group members to determine together.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We want to hear from you today and in the coming weeks about your desired level of ambition and what good might look like in terms of our outputs.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We hope to forge consensus amongst Working Group members on some principles to underpin how we collectively keep better sight of the overall mandate landscape, how we deal with duplication and overlap between mandates and what we do with mandates which might have outlived their original purpose.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We will be asking you how we can mitigate the unreasonable burden these aggregated instructions place on us as Member States and on the UN system, as well as what principles might underpin the creation of mandates that translate into clearer, fairer and more sustainable resource allocations.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We will also need to consider how any principles and actions we agree should be applied in practice, including in relation to mandates originating in UN bodies outside of New York.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: With that, I would now like to pass the floor to my Co Chair, Ambassador Wallace, to outline our thinking on the relationship between the Mandate process and the wider UN80 initiative process process.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Ambassador, thank you so much.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Co Chair.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We acknowledge that this process will unfold in parallel with the other UN 80 work streams on operational efficiencies and structural and programmatic changes.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We will therefore remain attentive to developments across the Initiative, while keeping our focus firmly on the mandate provided to this Group Group by the General Assembly.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Across all of our endeavors, we will be guided by the shared aspiration of the membership for a more effective and efficient United Nations.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The issues before us are significant, representing our collective strategic vision and operational expectations of the UN as a whole.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: This is why at this stage, engagement at the level of permanent representatives is especially important.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The political vision and strategic direction you bring will provide the compass by which this process is steered.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: With the expertise of colleagues to follow in due course as our work becomes more technical, colleagues as co chairs, we know the discussions ahead of us will be demanding and complex.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: However, it is with optimism and conviction that we believe this Working Group provides an excellent opportunity to improve how the United nations delivers for the communities we serve.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The strength of this Working Group will not lie in a document or a deadline, but in the quality of dialogue we foster together.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: If we succeed in creating a space that is constructive, candid and forward looking, we will have laid the foundation not only for this process, but for a stronger multilateral system.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Let us therefore seize this moment with a sense of common purpose and shared responsibility.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The United nations belongs to all of us and together we can ensure that it is equipped to meet the demands of today and the aspirations of tomorrow.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We thank you for the trust you have placed in us.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I now give the floor to the President of the General Assembly, Her Excellency Annalina Baerbock.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thank you, Excellencies, ladies and gentlemen, I'm pleased to join this inaugural meeting of the informal Ad hoc Working Group on the Mandate Implementation review under the UNAT initiative.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And I thank His Excellency, Mr. Brian Wallace, Permanent Representative of Jamaica, and Her Excellency, Ms. Carlene Schwalger, Permanent Representative of New Zealand, for their leadership and for bringing us together today.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I would like to also thank the Co Chairs of the revitalization process from Romania and South Africa.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We have worked also closely together and this is an outcome of your excellent work.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: So thank you very much.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And I think the presence today underlines the importance of this Working group because we are living, as we have heard, in challenging times and therefore also all of us as General assembly, do have a special responsibility in this process to take forward the Secretary General's report on mandate implementation, to distill guiding principles and to chart the next step that will make our mandates clearer, more effective and more accountable.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Underlining that it's not only paper, but that it's really implementation which matters.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: It builds on the dialogues begun last session by my predecessor, President Philemon Yang, and takes us to the next steps in this process.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And I'm also thankful to him and his team team for keeping me fully informed during the transition period.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And I intend to build upon their efforts and their open door.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I would like to also underline that this process of us as the General assembly is obviously part of the heart of the UNAD process on the adapting this organization for the 21st century.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Ensuring that our institution, that we are really fit for the future, that we really deliver as an institution on the efficiency level but also on the state of art level, like other institutions around the world.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And therefore, I would like to recall the three themes of the UN80 process.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Guy Raider will definitely go deeper into it, but I think it's good, good to have it always in mind when we speak about the mandates.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: First, to sharpen the efficiency, which includes cutting bureaucracy, reducing cost.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We have learned altogether what every minute costs here and making smarter use of our global presence.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Second is the mandate review itself, ensuring the many tasks entrusted to the UN remain focused and relevant.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And third, consider the system as a whole, drawing on the first two streams to assess whether deeper structural or programmatic changes are needed.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: So colleagues, in my opening address I spoke explicitly about this make it or break it moment, that this mandate review process is part of it, whether we make it or we break it.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And therefore, I believe and would like to underline what the co chairs have said, that we should take up this topic with a positive spirit, that we together can actually make it.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And that UN80 is not just an exercise in reform for reform itself.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Definitely not a cut cutting exercise for just cutting cost, but it's a chance for us to make this institution better and stronger together.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: It is a chance to prove that the UN can deliver more effectively and accountably for the people and it serves.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And the mandate review is an essential component of this because this is about us.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: This is where we as Member States, you and we as a GA in general can show that we are delivering, that we are leading by good examples ourselves.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Less than two weeks in office and already five mandate events plus two additional high level events are on the agenda next week.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: So I for myself tasked myself to always think with every new mandate and every session I chair, what could I learn for the future, to make it in the future more effective and more accountable to the people.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Because I believe that the organization cannot continue to layer more mandates on top of old ones, but has to focus on delivery efficiency and effectiveness.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And therefore I would like to give you a very small example.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: When we were preparing for now the upcoming high Level Speak week, like the ceremonial event on Monday, the Beijing platform based on resolutions and people told me, especially the Secretariat, every minute counts, it costs thousands of euro, but.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: But then I have a resolution saying you should put 16 speakers in one hour.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: So this doesn't work at all.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: But I cannot do anything about it because it's in there in the resolution.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: So I think looking really at this tiny examples where we can save a lot of money but also reflect all the time, not we've done it always like it always the speaker from there and there and there and there.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: But just reflect how we can learn also from the past.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: So definitely this is not an easy undertaking because everybody loves their darlings and this is I think also something which we could reflect to look really when we are presenting things, how we can lead by good examples.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Again, I'd like to underline what the co chairs have said.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Obviously it's not about now and the past, but looking for the future which also gives us strength that we can deliver on this very challenging timetable.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: In this regard I applaud you of the timetable.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Yes, it's ambitious.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I've heard already that some people say it might be a bit too ambitious, but I would say if it would be easy then others could do the job.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: So we work on that one together so that we can deliver as best as we can.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: My office, the OPGA will support wherever support is needed.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Also on transparency because obviously trust is the base for the work here together.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: So on this note I'm pleased that we were able to provide last minute also the public support for this discussion today and we are keen of keeping this transparency and the support also in the future.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: So thank you very much for the exchange today and I'm really looking forward of working together.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: On that one last mentioning, I would like to say I think it's of highest importance that this does not only stay in the room, but this is really taking up to senior level engagements.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: So with the high level week ahead, please prepare every head of State and minister visiting the PGA that I will double check if they have heard about UNAT before and the mandate review because obviously it is also an opportunity where we can show all together that we are not only working here together in New York, but also in the capitals in this regard.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Looking forward to a great hey, Labor Week and also to a great working group.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thank you.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I thank the President.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We have also requested Mr. Guy Ryder, under Secretary General for Policy in the Executive Office of the Secretary General to deliver some remarks on the support he and his team will be providing to this process.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I now give the floor to the Under Secretary General.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thank you very much, President of the 80th session of the General Assembly.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Co Chairs of this informal ad hoc working group.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Let me begin by congratulating the co chairs, Ambassador Wallace and Ambassador S.H. schwalger for their appointment to co chair this informal ad hoc working group on the UN80 initiative.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Ladies and gentlemen, the Secretary General has welcomed the adoption of resolution 79318 which endorsed the overall direction of the UN 80 initiative and we have taken note of the General Assembly's encouragement to submit proposals to strengthen the impact and the agility of the United nations while reducing duplication and improving mandate delivery.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And as the President of the General assembly has indicated, the 80th anniversary is an important opportunity to build on and to intensify the reforms of past years.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The UN80 initiative aims to move us towards an effective and sustainable United nations and Decision 79571 established the Informal Ad Hoc Working Group and the decision establishes that the Working Group will consider in its scope the proposals contained in the Secretary General's report on the Mandate implementation review and identify principles and follow up actions in order to improve the creation, delivery and review of mandates.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The timeline set out in that decision is certainly ambitious and I want to recognise your efforts in organising Co chairs this first meeting exactly two weeks after the adoption of the decision and your appointment and let me just take a moment today to speak to the proposals contained in the report by the Secretary General as a, I hope, important input to the work of this Working Group and we would gladly provide a technical briefing on specific aspects of the report if you request it.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Let me speak first to the areas outlined in the report in which the Secretary General will act to improve support to Member States throughout the mandate life cycle and these are listed in the report on the Mandate Implementation Review.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: To enhance mandate visibility and design, the UN system would accelerate the creation of mandate registries, improve Secretariat support, develop new tools and complement existing statements of expenditures with additional information on related programmatic activities.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: To improve reporting, the UN system will provide shorter reports, combine reports, introduce different report formats and publish download statistics and to improve mandate delivery management, the UN system will strengthen internal oversight, review mandate citations, better use system wide coordination platform reforms and apply all UN system commitments in the Funding Compact and to establish effective review mechanisms, the UN system will increase use of existing mechanisms to identify opportunities to consolidate and to streamline work and to strengthen results based management.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The United Nations Systems is working on a roadmap on how these different actions can be taken by the UN system in each of these areas and we will be able to provide you with further information on this internal roadmap if the Working Group requires it at a future meeting.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: If you request it, let me turn to the proposals now submitted by the Secretary General in his report on the Mandate Implementation Review that Member States may wish to consider as part of this intergovernmental process.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: To enhance mandate design, Member States may wish to reduce the length of mandate texts, frame mandates to allow the Secretary General appropriate flexibility and refrain from mandating new tasks without corresponding resources.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: To improve mandate delivery, Member States may wish to prioritise requests in mandates, fully apply all commitments by Member States through the Funding Compact and allow UN system entities greater flexibility to redeploy resources quickly and to support mandate review.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Member States may wish to systematise and to reinforce mandate review mechanisms, include expiry clauses and resolutions, introduce collective reviews of mandates and streamline how mandates are discussed.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Co Chairs, Distinguished delegates, in decision 79, 571, you have requested the Secretary General to provide substantive support to the Working Group as needed for the effective discharge of its mandate.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: As you determine how you wish to organise the work of this Working Group, the UN system is at your disposal.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: At the report's launch, many of you indicated that you would welcome further information on the data analysis and proposals across the mandate life cycle, and the Secretariat stands ready to provide an informal briefing on the data and insights in the report.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: As we recognise in the report, ultimately, Member States are own the mandates that they give to the UN system and that Member States also decide on next steps.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We are here to be of assistance.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: In your letter inviting me to this meeting, Co Chairs, you suggested that I speak to the support the UN system can provide to the Working Group's work, such as through the provision of additional data and analysis on each of the areas from the report that I have referred to in my remarks today, the UN system stands ready to provide you with that further information as you request it.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: For example, with regard to what is already in the report, I indicated earlier that you could request us to provide information on internal actions that we are taking, and we can also provide further background on the proposals that the Secretary General suggested Member States might wish to consider themselves or on the date that underpins the report.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: That said, as I have already indicated, it is for you to determine how you wish to organise this work and we remain at the full disposal of the Working Group.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I thank you.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I thank the Under Secretary General.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I now open the floor for statements by delegations.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Please press the microphone button if you wish to speak.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Please approach the Secretariat if you are speaking on behalf of a group of States.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Participants are reminded that statements are limited to five minutes for statements on behalf of groups and three minutes for statements in your national capacity.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Participants are also reminded to send their statement via the E Submit module on the Edelegate Platform.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Platform it's now my honour to give the floor to the Permanent Representative of Iraq, Speaking for the G77, the floor is yours.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: President of General Assembly Under Secretary General Excellencies Co Chairs I have the honor to deliver this statement on behalf of the group of 77 and China.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: @ the onset, allow me to congratulate both of you.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Her Excellency Caroline Schwalga and Permanent Representative of New Zealand and His Excellency Mr. Brian Wallace, permanent Representative of Jamaica, on your appointment as Co Chairs of the Informal Ad Hoc Working Group on the Mandate Implementation Review and the Work Stream 2 of the UN 80 initiative.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The group looks forward to working closely with you and we welcome that Our first meeting is dedicated to setting the tone of of the process.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The group views the UN8 initiative as an important step towards strengthening the role of the United nations in addressing global challenges.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We stress that any proposal under this Initiative and its three work streams must fully respect the purposes and principles of the Charter of the United nations as well as the intergovernmental nature of the organization.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The UN 80 process should reinforce, not dilute, multilateralism, ensure equitable participation of all Member States and address the priorities and concerns of developing countries.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The Group reaffirms the importance of learning from the past experiences to avoid repeating previous mistakes.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The earlier exercise, conducted about two decades ago, required significant effort but yielded limited results.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: In this regard, the Group request a detailed briefing by the Secretary on that process, which extended over several years.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: It would further assist in ensuring that the informal Ad hoc Working Group fully benefits the from prior lessons learned.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: It's therefore crucial to build on the outcomes of every review process undertaken so far in order to prevent duplications of effort in a process that is itself aimed at avoiding redundancy.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We must build upon what has already been agreed on to ensure our collective effort are not wasted.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The Group underlines three guiding principles.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: First, the spirit of consensus.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Second, Member State driven decision making and third, maintaining balance among the three pillars of the United nations.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: With development as a parity.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The Group underscores the importance of ensuring that the establishment and work plan of the Ad Hoc Working Group are conducted in a manner that allows for meaningful and inclusive deliberations.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We therefore support adopting a flexible timeline for its meetings, taking into account the concern of Member States, particularly given that the main segment of the General assembly is already a period of intense engagement across the Preliminary and its six main Committees.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Such flexibility would help create a more conducive environment for constructive discussions and allow all delegations to participate effectively, including smaller ones.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Further, the Group underscored the importance of ensuring that negotiations and decision making processes are conducted in an open, transparent and inclusive manner through established intergovernmental arrangements, norms and procedures.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We trust that the future consideration of such important matters will be pursued on the basis of broad consultations, consensus and shared ownership among all Member States.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The group of 77 in China will also submit written responses to the Co Chair's guiding questions, underscoring our readiness to engage substantively in the next stages of the process.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: To conclude, the group of 77 in China stresses that this first meeting is an important opportunity to set a constructive tone and to help shape a positive spirit for this process.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The Group reiterates its commitment to engage constructively and to ensure that this process remains inclusive, transparent and efficient with the full participation of all Member States.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I thank you.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I thank the Permanent Representative of Iraq and I now give the floor to the Permanent Representative of Singapore, speaking on behalf of a Group of Students States.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thank you very much.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Co Chairs, I have the honor to make this statement on behalf of the Small States Group ssg, which is a cross regional grouping of small States comprising developed and developing countries.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The list of countries that have aligned with this statement will be circulated after the meeting, but I'm pleased to inform members that this statement is supported by a group of 50 countries and we anticipate that more small States will join future statements within this Working Group.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The Small States Group welcomes the establishment of this informal Ad Hoc Working Group on Mandate Implementation Review.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We take this opportunity to congratulate the two Co Chairs on the appointment and we have every confidence that both of you will lead the process to a successful outcome for small States.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: An Effective Multilateralism A multilateral system underpinned by respect for the UN Charter and international law is not an option, but an existential necessity.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The 80th anniversary of the founding of the UN is therefore not only a moment for reflection about the future of our multilateral system, it is also an opportunity to reform and re energize the un.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: It is no secret that the multilateral system is under severe stress as a result of geopolitical tensions, economic fragmentation and unilateralism.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The establishment of this Working Group is therefore a timely and essential exercise to reposition the UN and streamline its work to deliver results for all our countries.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We wish to make three points.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: First, the Ad Hoc Working Group is a Member States driven process.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: It is therefore entirely in our hands to review all aspects of the mandate lifecycle as a means to reimagine and reposition the UN and to avoid duplication, enhance efficiency and deliver results on the ground.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: There's no doubt that all three streams of the UN 80 initiative are interconnected and the success of this process will have an impact on the other two work streams.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: With the use of new AI tools, we are better positioned to make sense of the UN mandates landscape in all parts of the UN ecosystem.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: At this early stage of this process, we believe it is important to keep an open mind, not rule anything out and allow for a discussion of all proposals and perspectives.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Secondly, the ad hoc working group should be forward looking and ambitious while avoiding the pitfalls and politicization that plagued previous UN reform efforts.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: While we should be ambitious, we should avoid an all or nothing approach.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: It is important that we take an incremental and pragmatic approach that can show results in this regard.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Our work in this process must be based on data and analyses on the UN's mandates landscape which will provide evidence based insights on how best to move forward.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Ultimately, our objective is to achieve the effective implementation of mandates while avoiding duplication and inefficiencies.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: In this regard, our process will strengthen the three pillars of the UN system so that it can deliver what has been agreed and adopted.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thirdly, the success of this Working group depends on political will and mutual trust among Member States.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: In this regard, we as a group of small States are committed to participating constructively to finding solutions and to build consensus.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We are encouraged by the fact that all Member States have acknowledged the need for a more efficient and stronger UN system.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: This gives us hope that we can collectively find solutions for the benefit of all our countries and people quotas.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The UN 80 initiative is an opportunity to imagine a better future for the multilateral system.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: In order for the UN to continue serving its purpose and our peoples, Member States must take responsibility in reshaping the mandate system which lies at the heart of how the UN functions and works.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We stand ready to work with the Co Chairs and with all Member States on achieving a meaningful mandate implementation review in line with the objectives of birth.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thank you very much for your attention.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I thank the Permanent Representative of Singapore speaking for the Small States Group.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And I now give the floor to the representative of guinea speaking for the African Group.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The floor is yours.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thank you. Co Chairs, Excellencies, I have the honor to deliver this statement on behalf of the African Group.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: At the outset, we wish to congratulate Ambassador Caroline Schwalger from New Zealand and Ambassador Brian Wallace from Jamaica on their recent appointment as Co Chairs.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We are confident in your leadership and abilities to steer our collective effort with utmost transparency and inclusivity, adhering to establishing the governmental norms and procedures that underpin this process, aligning with the statement from the Permanent Representative of Iraq on behalf of the group of 77 and China, the African Group wishes to make a few additional remarks.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We recognize the urgent need to streamline mandates to alleviate unnecessary administrative burdens on the United Nations.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The effectiveness of any reforms must enhance the Organization's responsiveness to the diverse priorities and pressing needs of Member States and the population we serve.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: While we collectively recognize the importance of to enhancing mandate implementation and streamlining outputs, it is imperative that the core mandates across all three pillars of the United nations, particularly the Development Pillar, are preserved.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The Working Group should remain open and receptive to a broader array of ideas beyond those outlined in the Secretary General's Report.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Moreover, it is crucial to adopt a realistic and focused approach when establishing meaningful and achievable targets.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: While ambition is important, it must align with existing realities to avoid repeating past failures in achieving intended outcomes.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The Working Group should not duplicate the work of existing bodies.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Rather, it should leverage those forums to address specific aspects, thereby allowing the Working Group to concentrate on its core objectives.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Furthermore, while the Secretariat plays a vital role in advancing efficiencies, intergovernmental organs must safeguard the integrity of mandates as outlined by the UN Secretary General.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Reform efforts should should proceed with full authority and oversight from Member States, ensuring transparency and inclusivity.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Our discussion must be guided by foundational principles.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Establishing realistic and achievable time frames is essential for interactive and constructive dialogues.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: This will enable meaningful deliberation without the pressure of rushed timelines.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: It is vital for the Working Group to be cognizant of the fact that many Member States will be actively engaged in the work of various committees and other processes which may hinder their ability to follow multiple discussions simultaneously.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: A Member State driven approach will enhance the quality of our discussions, fostering creativity and innovation in addressing pressing issues.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We must cultivate a culture of consensus in decision making, promoting collaboration and valuing diverse viewpoints.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: To effectively organize the agenda of the Working Group, we propose a phased instructor approach that allows an in depth examination of key issues.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Allocating adequate time for each phase is crucial for meaningful engagement.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Additionally, the agenda should reflect the priorities of all Member States while retaining the flexibility to adapt to evolving needs.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Implementing regular review points will facilitate the assessment of our progress and recalibrate discussions, ensuring a steadfast commitment to consensus and collaboration.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: In conclusion, the African Group is committed to actively and constructively participating in the discussions of the informal ad hoc Working Group on the mandate implementation Review.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I thank you for your attention.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I thank the representative of guinea speaking for the African Union.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And I now give the floor to the representative of the European Union.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The floor is yours.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thank you, Madam Chair, Madam President or the General Assembly.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Mr. Undersecretary General Dear Co Chairs, I have the honor to speak on behalf of the European Union and its member states.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The candidate countries, Turkey, North Macedonia, Montenegro, Albania, Ukraine, the Republic of Moldova, Bosnia and Herzegovina and Georgia, as well as Armenia, Andorra, Monaco and San Marino, align themselves with this statement at the outset, Allow me to thank the President of the General assembly for her important presence here today and to congratulate the permanent representatives of Jamaica and New Zealand on their appointments as Co Chairs of this informal ad hoc working group.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Dear Colleagues, you can count on the EU's full support to your work.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The European Union's member states are firmly committed to multilateralism and we are among the UN's leading political supporters and funders.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: It is precisely because of this commitment that we engage in the UN80 process, recognizing it is a unique opportunity to build a stronger United nations, an organization where its members can make informed decisions, translate these into effective mandates, and ensure the organization efficiently can deliver real impact on the ground for the people it serves, especially for those furthest behind.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: There is broad recognition that the mandate process has grown unwieldy and that we must look at this with renewed clarity of purpose.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We trust that under your guidance, this Working Group can help us review and streamline mandates, improve the creation and delivery, and increase accountability for impact.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: This will set us on a path that strengthens the UN for the future.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: In answering the questions that you have posed and following your guidance on how to best structure our discussion, allow me to share the European Union's views as on the question of how to make our discussions interactive, constructive and inclusive, the EU strongly supports a process that is open, transparent and participatory, where every voice can be heard and every delegation has a genuine role to play.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We believe that both informal dialogues and more structured meetings, regular opportunities for cross regional exchanges, and the early involvement of the Secretariat's expertise will be essential to keep discussions focused and constructive while ensuring that all perspectives are taken into account.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We would also encourage you to reach out to UN global hubs outside of New York to collect the fullest possible perspective on on mandate reform.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The Secretary General's and the Secretariat's expertise and analyses will be crucial in helping us make informed choices, improve efficiency and maximize the impact of our collective work.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Therefore, we should welcome the Secretariat's readiness to bring its full potential to bear under our guidance so that together we can succeed for the organization as a whole.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: On the question of the organization of work and sequencing of discussions, we welcome Considering a phased approach, listening widely, consulting deeply and reflecting carefully, including in cross regional settings before moving into more prescriptive text based negotiations will help us all build a better understanding of the work ahead and of different initial ideas and concerns with an open mind and thus help us make more informed and consensual choices.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We see merit in organizing the initial period around thematic clusters such as Principles for the Mandate lifecycle, options for improving mandate creation and review, and approaches to implementation so that deliberations can progress in a logical sequence leading into your Progress report by 15 December 2025.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: On the question of addressing the Secretary General's mandate Implementation Review Report and its recommendations, the EU believes the Working Group should focus on identifying systemic improvements and translating them into practical, results oriented outcomes.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: At the same time, we should situate our work within the broader context of the UNAD initiative to ensure coherence and to avoid duplication.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: In our view, a balanced approach drawing on the Secretariat's analytical input, past reform experiences and the priorities outlined in the Pact of the Future will give this group the opportunity to agree on principles as well as specific and concrete actions that can leave a lasting legacy that will guide the organization for years to come.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: To repeat what we said from the very beginning of this process, in our view at least, the Pact should be our what and the UNAD our how for for guiding the UN's reform and future action.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: In closing, Co Chairs, the European Union and its Member States stand ready at all levels to support you in this endeavor.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We are committed to working with you and with all delegations to turn this process into genuine collective success.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Together we can ensure that the UN is more effective and efficient, better equipped for the challenges of today and prepared for the demands of tomorrow.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thank you.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I thank the Permanent Representative of the European Union and I now give the floor to the Permanent Representative of Palau speaking for AOCs.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The floor is yours, Madam President.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: USG Rider distinguished CO Chairs, I have the honor to deliver this statement on behalf of the alliance of Small Island States aoc.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We align with the statement delivered by Iraq on behalf of the group of 77 in China and wish to provide the following additional views that are specific to small island developing States at the outset.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: AUSSIS extends our sincere congratulations to you Co Chairs on your appointment for this important process.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We're particularly pleased to see a fellow sids as well as a very good friend of sids leading our Working Group and you can count on our support and cooperation.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Distinguished CO Chairs as We mark the 80th anniversary of the United Nations, AOC sees this process as a vital opportunity to reaffirm the UN Charter while modernizing the organization's capacity to deliver for those who need it most, particularly sids.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Now allow me to respond to the three guiding questions before us.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: First, on ensuring that our discussions are interactive, constructive, and inclusive.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: As many of our members are represented by small delegations, convening meetings of the Working Group in parallel with those of the General Assembly's main Committees during the main session will inevitably prevent us from engaging meaningfully in the process.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Therefore, in order to ensure maximum participation by all delegations, efforts should be made to avoid scheduling meetings of the Working Group at the same time as the plenary meetings of the main Committees.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We also urge the CO Chairs to ensure early and transparent scheduling and circulation of background materials and to consider organizing most of the substantive work after the conclusion of the main session to ensure that we can all contribute fully to this important work.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Second, on organizing and sequencing our discussions While AOC prefers to begin the more substantive aspects of our work after the main session, we also recognize the CO Chair's mandate.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: In the interim.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We believe that the Working Group could focus its effort on more thematic decision discussions guided by the three core areas of the Secretary General's Mandate Implementation Review Report.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: These sessions would allow Member States to better understand the proposals under consideration, identify key questions, seek clarification and additional data from the report's authors where needed, and provide targeted inputs that can shape the direction of the review.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The goal during this initial phase should be to create a common understanding of the issues, identify areas of convergence, and lay the foundation for our more substant extent of work in 2026.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Third, on addressing the Secretary General's recommendations in the broader context of the UN80 initiative.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: As indicated in our earlier statements, AUSIS welcomes the Secretary General's commitment to improving the effectiveness and efficiency of the UN system.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The acknowledgement in his Mandate Implementation Review Report of systemic challenges such as fragmented implementation and uneven capacities are acutely felt by sids.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: At the same time, reform should also preserve investments in programs that serve the most vulnerable.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Investment and development mandates, including those supporting the implementation of the Antigua and Barbuda agenda for sids should not be deprioritized under the guise of restructuring.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: As such, AOC stresses that the Working Group's focus to consider proposals to review or realign mandates should aim to enhance the UN's ability to deliver on the mandates themselves and not result in reducing support for developing countries, particularly sids.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Ultimately, realignment must translate into improved mandate delivery for the people and countries who rely on the un.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The most distinguished Co Chairs.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: In closing, AUSS stands ready to engage constructively with you and Member States through the group of 77 to ensure transparent, inclusive and Member States journey and process that strengthens the UN's delivery for all.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I thank you.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I thank the Permanent Representative of Palau speaking for aosis.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And I now give the floor to the Permanent Representative of Kuwait speaking for the gcc.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The floor is yours.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I'm sorry.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I'm so sorry, I hate to interrupt you, but I am very sorry to inform you that the Working Group is not supported by translation.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I know this puts you in a really difficult position.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Where is Kuwait?

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I can't see you.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Madam Co Chair, if I may add, I did check previously and I was told that there will be translation today.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: But nonetheless it may be the case that we will have to send our statement then in English.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Sure. I am also very happy to give you a moment if you wanted to think about presenting your key points to us in English.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: So please let us know if you'd like to take the floor again.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We'll give you a moment to do that.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And again, on behalf of the Co Chairs, we really apologise for that misfortunate miscommunication.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thank you, Madam Chair.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Okay, please let us know.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: All right, I'll now take the next speaker on our list.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And I give the floor to the Permanent Representative of Belize speaking for caricom.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thank you, Madam Co Chair.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Madam President, USG Rider and Co Chairs.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I have the honor to deliver this statement on behalf of the 14 member states of the Caribbean Community.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We align ourselves with the statement delivered by Iraq on behalf of the group of 77 in China and the statement delivered by Palau on behalf of the alliance of Small Island States.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Let me offer to both of you caricom's heartfelt congratulations on your appointment and assure you of our constructive engagement in this process.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: CARICOM recalls its statement of 1st August on UN80 in in which we emphasize the need for clear, practical and equitable modalities that reflect the priorities of all Member States.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We underscored the imperative to deliver better results for people and planet anchored in adequate resourcing system, wide efficiency and above all, equity.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: This holds true for the Mandate Implementation Review Co Chairs guided by these principles, CARICOM offers the following observations on your helpful guidance questions.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: First, on building an inclusive process, the informal ad hoc working group process must ensure the full and meaningful participation of all delegations, especially smaller ones like ours.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Transparency, predictability and timely sharing of documents are essential to enable equitable engagement with with regard to engendering interactive approaches, we urge the avoidance of overlaps with main committees and plenary debates.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: As just pointed out by eosis, structured but flexible engagement formats, including short interventions, focused clusters and informal exchanges can facilitate more interactive and inclusive discussions regarding the sequencing of work.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: CARICOM urges that meetings early in the 80th session allow for robust Member States input as well as the provision of necessary data and analysis to inform our discussions and we thank USG Rider for offering the Secretariat support in that regard.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: With this in mind and appreciating intimate connection across all UN80 work streams, we recommend an early mapping of the Secretary General's recommendations to identify priority areas for for collective attention, the CO Chairs could undertake a sequence approach, beginning with practical and cross cutting issues such as registries, reporting and financing, followed by thematic discussions on mechanisms like expiry clauses and review modalities.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We stress the importance of regular stock taking, ensuring Member States perspectives Guide the Coaches progress report in December of course CARICOM reaffirms the centrality of Member States authority over mandates reforms must preserve their prerogatives and must not dilute well established commitments and here we emphasize in particular those critical to small island developing States.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: With regards to the UN Secretary General's report, we welcome aspects of the Secretary General's Mandate Implementation Review Report that enhance visibility and accessibility while providing safeguards for equity and oversight in areas such as artificial intelligence.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: While we support greater efficiency, we have emphasized that it must never come at the expense of impact or equity for our countries.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Like other small island and low lying coastal states, accountability must go beyond aggregate system wide metrics to reflect the unique vulnerabilities and development needs of sids.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: In closing, thank you very much Co Chairs and we look forward to engaging with you throughout this process.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I thank the Permanent Representative of Belize speaking for caricom and I now give the floor to the Permanent Representative of Australia speaking for Cairns.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thank you very much indeed Chair and congratulations to both Co Chairs on their appointment.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: This has been very significant as an exercise.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thank you President of the General assembly for joining us this morning and also to USG Guy Ryder.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I have the honour to speak, as you mentioned, on behalf of Canada, New Zealand and my own delegation Australia.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We welcome the establishment of this informal ad hoc working group to develop principles and actions to improve the creation, delivery and review of mandates.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Today represents an important step in taking forward the UN 80 initiative process, and we're delighted to be in such capable hands and have great confidence in your leadership.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Our delegations acknowledge that the United nations is under pressure, demands for delivery are high and the financial situation is exceptionally challenging.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We're committed to working collaboratively in the Fifth Committee to support the adoption of the revised regular budget for this session.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We're also waiting with anticipation to see the Secretary General's proposals on structured reforms and program realignment in the near future.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: While this Working Group is primarily focused on mandates, Cairns acknowledges the interconnected nature of the three UN 80 initiative work streams.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: This Working Group will need to be mindful of the other UN80 work streams as it carries out its work if we're to achieve a UN system that that is more effective and responsive now and into the future.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We welcome the CO Chair's proposed approach as outlined this morning.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: A process which is inclusive, transparent, data driven, creative, open minded, and which reflects the varied priorities of Member States and observers will be essential.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: This Working Group provides an opportunity to take a more strategic approach to how mandates are created, funded, implemented and reviewed.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: As noted on 1 August, Cairns welcomes the proposals in the Secretary General's Mandate Implementation Review Report as important substantive input to the work of the Working Group.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: As we touched on the 2nd of September, we also believe the following points will be key to achieving meaningful and lasting reform through this Working Group.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: First, we consider how to improve mandates at the system level.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We we need to learn the lessons from almost 20 years ago when a similar mandate exercise was conducted as were ultimately unsuccessful because it focused on reviewing individual mandates.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The sheer number of existing mandates means a mandate by mandate approach in this Working Group is simply not feasible in the time that we have available.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Second, the development and sharing of comprehensive information and analysis by the Secretariat, including but not limited to the online registry of mandates, will be crucial to help members of the Working Group understand how we might do better in drafting, implementing and evaluating mandates.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Third, we encourage this Working Group to focus on how we might collectively develop practical measures to reduce duplication, eliminate redundancies, link mandate decisions with projected costs, enhance efficiencies in implementation and and terminate mandates that we agree have become obsolete.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The upcoming Committee season is an opportunity to reflect on those issues and consider matters we could take forward in this Working Group.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Fourth, we note that some of the recommendations in the report are within the existing authorities and remit of the Secretary General.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We encourage the Secretary General to make full use of his authorities to action these recommendations as soon as possible and for this Working Group to focus on those issues that require approval or action by Member States.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Finally, we echo the call for strengthened monitoring and assessment of mandate implementation.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: This is essential to ensure our commitments here in New York and other United nations fora translate into impact on the ground.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: CAANS looks forward to working constructively with our fellow Working Group members on practical steps to strengthen the the capacity of the United nations to deliver its mandates.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thank you very much.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I thank the Permanent Representative of Australia speaking for Cairns.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I will shortly invite the Permanent Representative of the Solomon Islands speaking for the Pacific Island Forum to speak, but just to let you know, this is the last speaker, at least that we understand.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Speaking for a group if you are speaking for a group and you've not yet taken the floor, please do let the Secret Secretariat no Permanent Representative Solomon Islands Please go ahead.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thank you very much.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Court Chairs, I have the honor to deliver this statement on behalf of the Pacific Island Forum members, in short PITH who are based in New York.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We welcome the establishment of the Working Group.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We stress the importance of an open, transparent and inclusive process and welcome the assurances made by the Co Chairs in this regard.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We welcome the appointment of the two Co Chairs who include a PEAF member and a small island developing State member.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: You have our full support.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We recognize the importance of all organizations, including the un, continuing to evolve and improve to better deliver for the people they serve.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Indeed, the PIF members are also currently undergoing their own reform of the Pacific regional architecture.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Co Chairs we know that most PIF members find the volume of the UN's work program to be highly demanding, especially given the size and the capacities of many PIF missions.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: PIF members are therefore cautiously optimistic about the potential benefits to be achieved by improving how mandates are created, implemented and reviewed.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: At the structural level, we stress the importance of ensuring that the Working Group gives appropriate attention to ensuring the UN achieves effectiveness and impact across all the three pillars of its peace and security, sustainable development and human rights.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We want to highlight the importance of the UN development system for the Pacific island countries in this regard.

session_title: First meeting of the working group

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Finally, we acknowledge that the question of mandates is very much one of the Member states, but welcomed the input of the Secretary General and his team in assisting members of the Working group with any data or analysis that they request.

text: Co Chairs in addition to the points made by the European Union, I would like to add a few of my own.

session_title: First meeting of the working group

text: We count on your leadership and we support it.

session_title: First meeting of the working group

session_title: First meeting of the working group

text: We have to look ourselves in the mirror how we can create more efficiency and effectiveness through our work.

session_title: First meeting of the working group

session_title: First meeting of the working group

session_title: First meeting of the working group

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I want to commend your call to Member States to contribute to all these efforts, to participate at the appropriate level, senior level, ambassador level, preferably wherever this is possible.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I think these discussions are very complex.

text: The timeline is very short, it is true, but I think we can get it done at the end of the day.

session_title: First meeting of the working group

session_title: First meeting of the working group

session_title: First meeting of the working group
