session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: With that, I give the floor to the distinguished representative of Switzerland.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thank you Co Chair and I would like to start by joining colleagues and extending our warmest congratulations on your appointment as Co Chairs.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: My country looks forward to working under your wise leadership and we thank the Secretary General for his comprehensive report and also USG Rider for presenting some of the aspects today as much as the pga.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And we welcome the progress made on the Mandate Registry which will provide Member States with much needed visibility across the system.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: My country recalls that the work of the United nations is based on three interdependent pillars, as it was just also mentioned by our colleague from the Solomon Island.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: This review therefore must strengthen all these pillars in a balanced manner and avoid treating them in isolation.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The review must also be the subject to constructive engagement by all Member States, each of which must be prepared to make concessions so that the UN's work is sustainable, effective and in line with available resources.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: So our approach will be based on four principles.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: First, combating duplication of must be a priority.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Mandates are an essential framework for UN action, but when they overlap they fragment the system and instead they should reinforce existing areas of expertise, for example in the fields of health, humanitarian action or human rights, where knowledge and capacity are already concentrated.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: To this end, intra and institutional competition must be avoided and the core capacities of entities must be be adequately funded.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Second, build on what works the Quadrennial Comprehensive Policy Review.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The QCPR illustrates how Member States can provide policy guidance without reopening individual mandates.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The resulting reform of the United nations development System proves that clear guidance can realign the system and produce results.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Similarly, functional support services should be consolidated, shared and strengthened by not dismantled.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The measures envisaged must aim for long term efficiency and be based on sound cost benefit analysis.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Third, mandates must be forward looking.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: They must be clear, coherent and adequately resourced to be credible and effective, but they must also anticipate tomorrow's challenges and benefit from technological advances and the interaction between science and diplomacy.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Fourth, the responsibility of Member States Ultimately, it is up to us to ensure the coherence of the system in the General assembly as well as in the governing bodies of the specialized agencies.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: While fully respecting their autonomy, we must act coherently in all the bodies in which we participate.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: This also means that the review must go beyond the Secretariat alone and cover the entire United nations system.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We have a unique opportunity to rethink and strengthen the system.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Switzerland is ready to work constructively with all delegations to ensure that this review brings about concrete improvements.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Switzerland is determined to continue to offer the full support of Geneva, a place of inclusiveness, innovation, digital development and scientific foresight that will increase the effectiveness of the United nations as a whole.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I thank you,

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I thank the distinguished representative of Switzerland and I now give the floor to the distinguished representative of Argentina.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Good morning, colleagues, Distinguished Co Chairs, PGA Under Secretary Ryder in addition to the statement delivered by the Xi77 and China, the Argentine delegation expresses the following on its national capacity, the UN 80 initiative represents an opportunity to evaluate the overall functioning of the organization and seek convergences to promote more efficient and effective functioning of the United nations system while optimizing the fulfillment of the mandates.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Eight years after its creation, we must remember that the organization was established with the objective of preserving international peace and security, resolving disputes among its members and defending the freedom and rights of individuals.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Therefore, we must focus in the principles of the Charter and thus reassess the role of the institution recognized by society as a forum for the peaceful resolution between states.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We must also make accurate and realistic diagnosis and recognized that in recent years certain agendas had been oversized, generating inefficiencies and distancing the work of the UN from its original mandates.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Peace, security and development.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We recognize the role of the Member States, based on their sovereign powers, in providing political guidelines to the UN system among and supervising its work, and the role of the Secretary General as a Chief Administrative officer in promoting the necessary administrative reforms.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The UN 80 also represents an opportunity to have a more efficient UN system and the management of administrative and financial resources, reducing expenses and eliminating overlapping functions.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: In this exercise, we must assume shared responsibility between Member States and the UN system for the proliferation of certain mandates, but also for the proliferation of parallel initiatives, meetings and agendas that, without an intergovernmental mandate, lead to an oversizing and duplication of certain agendas and debates.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Co Chairs we must take into account existing debates and formal spaces.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: For example, the recent process of revitalizing the working methods of the General Assembly.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The UN 80 initiative is structural and comprehensive and we therefore await the result of the 2026 budget review and the World Stream 3 report.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The review of mandates is a very important and sensitive issue and therefore must be addressed prudently and specifically without resorting the general approaches of principles.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Under the one size fits all concept.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Regarding the work of this other group, we consider it necessary to to have a predictable roadmap for the coming months, avoiding overlaps with the key moment of the Committee's work, especially for small and medium sized delegation and generate, as you said, quality dial IO.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Additionally, and as a preliminary idea, we wish to preserve the General Rule that General assembly resolutions remain valid until they are fully implemented and not be undermined by sunset clause.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Finally, the Group the Working Group could follow the methodology of the Secretary General's report organized into three stages, mandate creation, mandate execution and mandate review.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The Group could focus its work on the first two stages and in this initial phase, considering the third stage requires a more comprehensive approach in time.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thank you so much.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I thank the distinguished representative of Argentina and now give the floor to the distinguished representative of Bangladesh.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thank you. Co Chair Let me begin by thanking both of you for convening this meeting.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Bangladesh welcomes the Secretary General's UN Initiative Unit Initiative as a timely and necessary step forward revitalizing the UN Development system.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We believe this reform process should aim at enhancing the effectiveness, efficiency and responsiveness of the event system.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: This is a moment to make the event more purpose driven, more inclusive and more accountable those who serve.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: However, the reform process must retain a clear focus on those left farthest behind the events.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Development system must continue to provide solutions for protracted humanitarian and political crises around the world.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Reforms must now translate into measures that cut necessary resources to the UN offices that support countries in special situations.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Peacekeeping, peace building, climate resilience and sustainable development must remain our core priorities with the provision of adequate resources to fulfill mandates and to sustain effectiveness.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Co Chairs, the reform process must be guided by the principles of objectivity, universality and impartiality, ensuring that priorities are based on genuine needs and not influenced by discrimination and selectivity.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I thank you Co Chairs for convening this meeting.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I thank the distinguished representative of Bangladesh and now give the floor to the distinguished representative of Paraguay.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Co Chairs, Madame pga, First allow me to congratulate you both, Caroline Schwarzer, Permanent Representative of New Zealand, and Brian Wallace, of course Permanent Representative of Jamaica, on your appointment as a Co Chair of this Hard Working Group, Paraguay welcomes your first meeting and extend its support to the process and to you co facilitators.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We echo the sentiment expressed by the G77 in China and would like to add a few comments in our national capacity.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: As we have mentioned on previous occasions, Paraguay supports any initiative aimed to improving the operational efficiency of the United nations system and emphasizes its firm's position on strengthening the development pillar as a part of this effort to create a more efficient organization.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We also stress the need for the establishment and work plan of the hard Working Group to be organized with sufficient flexibility, considering that the main part of the General assembly session consists with the intense workload in the Plenary and its six main committees which will allow for the effective participation of all delegation, including small ones.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: With regards to the organization of the work, we suggest a sequence that move from the general to specific.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: First clarify common objectives, then address technical or sectorial issues and finally agree on concrete recommendations.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We also believe it's important to identify specific expect objectives from the outset.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The roadmap that the PGA just mentioned will be crucial so that the debate does not remain purely conceptual.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We consider the work carried out by the Secretariat to review the implementation of mandate to be important in this regards.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The results of this analysis could be of vital assistance to our review work, for which we will require an efficient schedule that does not conflict with the task of the committees that will begin shortly, especially for small delegations like ours and many others.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: In this regard, we trust that the CO facilitator will be able to guide us toward the achievement of this objective with due diligence.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And finally, we reiterate CO facilitators our support for the use of technology during this review process.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Such artificial intelligence, given that it can accelerate the analysis of information, identify redundancies and propose synergies based on evidence, thus contributing to more informed and transparent decisions.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thank you both.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I thank the distinguished representative of Paraguay.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I now give the floor to the distinguished representative of Zambia.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thank you very much, Excellencies, Co Chairs Adornset.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Allow me to congratulate the both of you Co Chairs on your appointment to lead this Working Group.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I'd like to assure you that of Zambia's support, Zambia aligns with the statement statements delivered by the group of 77, China, the small States Group and the Africa Group and would like to make the following remarks in our national capacity.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Zambia recognizes the urgent need to streamline mandates to alleviate the unnecessary administrative burdens on the un.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We should take note that the effectiveness of any reform must enhance the organization's responsiveness to their diverse priorities and pressing needs of Member States and the populations we serve.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I do want to underline here that we must preserve the comparative advantage of the United nations, which makes it a very unique institution given the constraints on collective time and resources, especially during this main part of the session.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The program of work to be adopted should allow for substantive discussions and consultations with Member States to ensure that all the voices of Member States are heard while taking into consideration the business schedule of committees and delegations.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Further, we recognize that the mandate of this working this Ad hoc Working Group focuses on Work Stream 2 and as stated by others, it's important to review how this mandate relates to other work streams to ensure that there's no duplication with regard to the organization's work and sequence of discussion.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Zambia recommends that the Adult Working Committee clearly outlines how the process the review process will be conducted, including whether a preliminary report will be shared with Member States prior to its submission to the General Assembly.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Informal consultations should be designed to allow for delegation sufficient time to provide input before any zero outcome document is presented.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Additionally, there must be clarity on how the Ad Hoc Working Committee will coordinate with other UN Committees as stated, especially since these bodies will continue to deliberate and issue mandates concurrently.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: It is essential to define how these new mandates will interact with the ongoing work of the Ad Hoc Committee.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: On the last point, with regard to the Working Group you know most effectively addressed the matters relating to the Secretary General's Mandate Implementation Review Report.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Zambia notes that the SG's report on mandate implementation focuses on the full cycle of mandates to identify systemic challenges affecting the US UN's effectiveness and agility.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: In this context, it is important for the Ad Hoc Working Group to clearly define the scope of this review and specifically here we see clarity on whether the Committee will limit itself to the mandates of the General assembly or it include other mandates other resolutions such as ECOSOC and the Security Council.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: In conclusion, I wish to assure you of Zambia's commitment to actively and constructively participate in the discussions of the informal and Ad hoc Working Group and the Mandate Implementation Review.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thank you.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I thank the distinguished representative of Zambia.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I now give the floor to the distinguished representative of China, Cortez.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: All protocols are observed.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: China aligns itself with the statement by Iraq on behalf of the G77 and China.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: This unity reform offered the UN an opportunity for self renewal by enhancing its governance capacity and better adapting to the evolving circumstances.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We would like to offer five suggestions.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: First, we must remain true to the founding mission at a Time when multilateralism and the UN are under severe strain, it is more important than ever to recall the spirit that brought nations together 80 years ago.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: China believes that the reform must revitalize the UN authority and vitality, safeguard the purpose and principles of the UN Charter, enable the organization to keep pace with the times and ensure that it will continue to play a central role in international affairs and make greater contributions to the for the world peace and development.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Second, we must strive for real results with high efficiency.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: China believes that the reform should focus on improving the quality and efficiency of the UN's work, as well as its agility, responsiveness and the resilience of this organization.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: In this process, wasteful spending, redundant formalities and excessive bureaucracy, more must be avoided.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: As Member States, we are all familiar with the burden of too many meetings and too many documents, and I believe there is a broader consensus on the need for change.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The Working Group may start from this aspect to deliver visible improvements at early dates.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Third, we must stay action oriented.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: This Working Group was established by the GA to improve the creation, delivery and review of the mandates by identifying principles and follow up actions.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: As essential as they are, principles alone cannot be enough.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: They must be matched with concrete, actionable measures.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Only then can the reform be truly implemented with tangible results.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Therefore, we believe that when discussing relevant principles, the Working Group should also design supporting implementation measures.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: This will ensure that the UN makes real steps and deliver real outcomes, thereby winning the future through real achievements.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Fourth, we must strengthen research and analysis.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The mandates of the Secretariat comes out of the nearly 4,000 resolutions and other resources.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The sheer scale and complexity make it very difficult for Member States to see all the details.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We believe that the Secretariat can do more.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: It should build on the Secretary General's reports and recommendations, summarize past lessons and put forward practical proposals for the Working Group.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: At the same time, the Co Chairs should heed the views of the broader UN membership to foster cooperation, build consensus and seek solidarity through consultation so that the work of this group can stand the test of history.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Fifth, we must make a balanced approach to the three pillars.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The GA resolution makes it very clear that the reform should ensure effective and efficient mandate delivery across all three pillars, namely peace and security, development and human rights of the United Nations.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Let me conclude by reaffirming that China will continue to work together with all Member States and the Secretariat to improve the work of the UN and steer the global governance system toward a more justable and equitable direction.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thank you.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I thank the distinguished representative of China.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I now give the floor to the distinguished representative of the United States.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thank you, Ambassador Wallace. Ambassador Schwager, congratulations on your appointment as the co chairs of the informal ad hoc working group.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We look forward to working you with both of you in this capacity.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: In particular, over the coming months we will need to identify an ambitious set of principles and follow up actions to improve the creation, delivery and review of mandates.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The United nations was established to resolve the most pressing international challenges.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The mandates we provide this organization should reflect the seriousness of that purpose.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: They should be clear, concise, targeted and have tangible results.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The ad hoc working group should result in better prioritization, greater impact and elimination of duplication across the work of the the United Nations.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The Secretary General's report on the review of mandate implementation identifies numerous proposals for consideration by Member States.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Shorter mandates, prioritization within mandates, flexibility to align resources, inclusion of expiration clauses, reviews of mandates, streamlining agendas and programs of work across different organs, among others.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: These recommendations are concrete and practical and many of them are not new.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The General assembly just adopted the latest resolution on the revitalization of its work which quote, strongly encourages Member States to reduce the frequency, length and number of resolutions and to only reintroduce resolutions when operational adjustments are being made.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Language that was unfortunately watered down during negotiations and it includes language, sorry.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And language on the establishment of sunset clauses did not make it into the final text.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We hope that in the spirit of UN80, this ad hoc working group will build on and strengthen such proposals.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Our success depends on our collective willingness for reform.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: In parallel, we encourage the Secretary General to move quickly to implement the recommendations in his report that he can take under his own authority.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And we thank Under Secretary General Guy Ryder for his remarks and information in that regard.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thank you very much.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I thank the distinguished representative of the United States and give the floor to the distinguished representative of Indonesia.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thank you, Excellency.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Let me join others to congratulate you and also the Permanent Representative of New Zealand on your assumption of duties as Co chairs of this informal adult working group.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Indonesia also welcomes this first meeting of the Working Group as a chance to shape priorities and deliver progress to this task.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Allow me to highlight three key priorities of our delegation.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: First, Indonesia stress the need to draw lessons from the past similar processes.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Let's ensure that our future work must be efficient and well targeted.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Second, we believe that open and inclusive approaches are fundamental to ensure broad participation from Member States, including in their national capacity or in the form of groupings.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Third, we need to ensure that the process will align with other relevant parallel processes to avoid Duplication in particular this include the GA revitalization, ICOSOC reform, as well as the discussion on the reform of the Security Council.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Excellency, we need outcomes that make a difference, not just more paper.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: In this regard, we also would like to ask a question to the how do the coaches envision the final product of this exercise?

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The information is crucial to help delegations calibrate their efforts and to contribute to the discussion so that we can focus on delivering tangible results.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Excellencies, Distinguished Delegates, we share the Co Chair's view that the task is demanding, but it's not impossible.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: So let's continue keeping the process open, inclusive and focused to turn limited time into meaningful progress.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Indonesia stands ready to contribute to that spirit.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thank you.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I thank the distinguished representative of Indonesia.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I give the floor now to the distinguished representative of El Salvador.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Gracias. Dear Co Chairs, Excellencies El Salvador and Ecuador warmly welcome the leadership of New Zealand and Jamaican Co Chair.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: In this process, you can count on our full support and constructive engagement.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Our delegations Besides aligning to the G77 statement, we would like to highlight the following.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: First, BSG's recent report on the review and mandate implementation underscored China challenges that Member States know too well.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The proliferation of meetings, increasingly lengthy reports, duplication of work across entities and the fragmented financing.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: These are not abstract concerns.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: They directly undermine the organization effectiveness and also the credibility.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: This points to an urgent need to rationalize the agenda and discussions on bienalization, tranalization or or the creation of new items cannot remain side notes to working methods debates that repeatedly are deferred to action.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And in this sense, in this Working Group, we Member States must demonstrate not only the willingness but the political will to improve the functioning of organization.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And that also means refraining from tabling resolutions or initiatives that add volume without impact or outcomes without action.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: So I take this opportunity also to make that call and that we must be serious, disciplined and ready to do our part.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Even changes that may appear modest or minimum can definitely generate a transformative impact.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: So, Co Chairs, let me also be clear.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: None of this is near the other working group revitalization.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Most recent resolutions provide some expectations and they give us some guidance on this.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: So the UNAID initiative must now build on these commitments and not reinvent them.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And in that regards, we urge you Co Chairs to structure this group's work holistically, drawing, as many other colleagues have mentioned before, drawing from lessons from past processes, but also ensuring applicability across the organization's principals and subsidiary bodies.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: So in other words, our task is not to reinvigorate the wheel, but to make it run faster and more effectively.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We also call for realism in scheduling.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The heavy workload of the last quarter of the year restrains all delegation, particularly small ones as Ecuador and El Salvador.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: So the proliferation of processes definitely undermines inclusivity and meaningful participation.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: So timelines must reflect this reality.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Furthermore, clarity will be needed on how upcoming mandates and agreements emerging from the main committees will feed into the UNAD process.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Therefore, close coordination with committee chairs will be crucial.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And finally, this initiative must be forward looking.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Innovation should guide both the consultations and the proposals.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And we believe the future of the UN depends not only, as I mentioned before, on political will, but also on its capacity to adapt and modernize.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Nevertheless, Member States should carefully consider and study those proposals related to the potential use of new tools, including AI, to ensure that they are responsibly but also effectively used in this process.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I thank you.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I was distracted because I was congratulated my neighbor for her excellent statement on behalf of El Salvador, Salvador and Ecuador, of course.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: So with this in mind, I just a few comments to add in my national capacity.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: But based on your opening remarks, Co Chairs, I would be remiss not to offer you from the outset the support of my delegation.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: This also goes to the PGA and Elena Burbuk and the Secretary as Representative Guy.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Basically what I'm speaking about is helping this organization to overcome its deficiencies.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Particularly because this exercise, as we have heard, coincides with a moment that is not only historic but highly challenging.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Contrary to the spirit of San Francisco.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The challenges of our times go to the very realm multilateralism, which is being questioned often with good reasons.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Therefore, the UNAD initiative should be another instrument to strengthen the capacity to respond to today's global challenges to deliver tangible results to our peoples.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I have no doubt that your proved leadership Co Chairs will succeed in contributing to have a stronger, more multilateralism led by the United nations, with sound and realistic mandates on peace and security, development and human rights.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: To conclude, we are ready to engage at the political level as you have asked us because particularly smaller delegations such as mine are ready to to be in the table.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thank you very much.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Dear Co Chairs, USG Rider Dear Co Chairs, I join others in congratulating you on your appointment as school FACILITATORS of this Working Group and as usual, you can count on my delegation support.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: My delegation aligns itself with a statement delivered by the Chair of the group of 77 in China and adds the following brief comments as we launch the activities of the working group on Workstream 2, it is of utmost importance to keep in mind that time is the scarcest resource we have.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Its efficient use is critical.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The constraints of initiating an ambitious task in parallel to the Main Committee's main session are not to be underestimated.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We suggest dedicating these initial months to listening and reflecting before devising the shape and content of any outputs which could be left for a second moment, namely after the December progress report.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Ensuring open and inclusive participation in these discussions, including those of smaller delegations, is key to ensuring a smooth Member State driven process.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: A very careful scheduling of activities of the Working Group is likely the most effective ways to ensure inclusivity.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: As many others have indicated, it is key to learn from the previous exercise of mandate review and avoid strenuous efforts that could only lead to a repetition of the limited results then achieved.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The recommendations from the Secretary General's report provide valuable initial input for our work.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: As we begin to think ways to consider those recommendations, we suggest to focus on discussions that could enable legislative bodies to better design and review mandates that seems more effective and viable than emphasizing a backward looking approach.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Mandate creation, delivery and review should not be viewed as a concentrated exercise taking place once every few years or decades.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: These tasks are matters that deserve continuous attention by Member States in all mandate generating bodies.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I thank you.

text: We must seize the opportunity for the coming months of the coming months to first, establish a sound and rigorous assessment of the current landscape with the support of a Secretariat.

text: Particular attention should be given to a more detailed identification and documentation of overlaps and duplications in the implementation of certain mandates.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Second, reach consensus and concrete proposals concerning the full life cycle of a mandate, from its creation to its implementation, ultimately its evaluation.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: In this regard, the proposals and recommendations contained in the Secretary General's report offer an excellent foundation for work.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: You can count both of you and the Secretariat on France's strong support and full engagement to help ensure the success of this essential work.

text: I think this Working Group might benefit from being very pragmatic and discussing the ideas and the language that we are expected to put forward.

text: I agree with all those speakers and support the focus on consensus basis.

text: That should be guidance for us in our work.

text: And as far as organization and sequence of the Working Group's work, we are suggesting step by step approach.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: By this we mean that we need to address least controversial issues in the report of the ESG and find the issues that everyone has no objections against and put forward them as our recommendations.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And then we can move on to discuss to more sensitive areas which we have divergent views and which will take more time to elaborate our recommendations.

text: I should also say that the Secretary General report is providing a number of recommendations both to be implemented by the Secretary General and to be considered by the General Assembly.

text: I would like to note that the resolution of the GA which is establishing the Working Group is not differentiating the proposals, it is talking about all the proposals.

text: Because for example, my delegation is not seeing all the recommendations as marked by SG own prerogative to be this own prerogative.

text: I think all recommendations deserve our dialogue, our considerations.

text: We found that a lot of recommendations put forward by the Secretary General are very constructive, very wise and very beneficial for the future of the UN.

text: Yet we have to recognize that it is not 100% recommendations.

text: So I think that this would also be in support of a lot of delegations who spoke to the end of the Member States driven process.

session_title: First meeting of the working group

text: I thank the Russian Federation for their remarks and I now give the floor to the representative of Algeria, to be followed by Thailand and then Pakistan.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Algeria, the floor is yours.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: As a firm advocate of multilingualism, my delegation deeply regrets the absence of translation to this meeting.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Excellencies Co Chairs as an opening note, allow me to congratulate you on your appointment as Co Chairs of this important process.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: My delegation aligns itself with a statement delivered by G77 in China and the African Group, and I would like to add a few remarks on my national capacity.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Algeria attaches great importance to the UNHCG initiative, which offers a timely opportunity to strengthen the effectiveness of the United nations across its three pillars, not merely as a response to budgetary constraints, but because after eight decades, our organization must evolve into a version that is both up to date and efficient, worthy of the trust placed in it by the people of the world.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: This work must remain member state driven and consensus based, as the organization's legitimacy rests on its intergovernmental nature and the sovereign equality of all its members.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Any review of mandates should therefore reflect the shared priorities of the membership and respect their sovereign rights equally.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: This process must be firmly rooted in the Charter of the United nations and in the established rules of procedure of the General Assembly.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: These are not mere formalities.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: They are the compass ensuring fairness, inclusivity and transparency.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: At the same time, refunds should not become an exercise in paperwork, but a means of lightening the weight that too often slows our organization and threatens the credibility of multilateralism.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: By reducing unnecessary burdens, we enable the United nations to channel its energy into concrete results.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: To succeed, we must be not only rigorous, but also creative and innovative, drawing on ideas from across the membership and not solely from SG reports.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: In this sense, work stream 2 on mandate implementation Review must also speak to the aspirations expressed in the two other work streams.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Reform cannot be fragmented.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: It must instead weave together these trends in synergy.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Finally, Algeria believes that the work of this ad hoc working group should proceed in phases that allow adequate time for meaningful and effective Participation by all delegations.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: In conclusion, Algeria reaffirms its readiness to engage constructively.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I thank you,

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I thank the representative of Algeria and I now give the floor to the representative of Thailand, our permanent representative of Thailand, to be followed by Pakistan and Lichtenstein.

text: Thailand, the floor is yours.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thank you.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Kochai.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Congratulations to both of you on this very important appointment and thank you so much for convening this meeting.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thailand alliance itself with statements delivered by Iraq on behalf of GS Vincent China and I wish to deliver this statement from our national capacity.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Mandates are the property and responsibility of Member States.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: It is up to us to decide when mandates should be created, which mandates are still relevant and of course which mandates have become obsolete.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The Secretary General has provide a thoughtful and data driven proposals.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: But of course the choices and the political will lie with us.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: This group has only six months to deliver recommendations.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Given this short time frame, you must be pragmatic and focus on what is feasible and doable from the SDA report.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: One useful approach perhaps could be to identify a set of quick wins, practical measures that can be agreed upon early, such as streamlining reports and resolutions or piloting sunset clauses.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: These measures could be of course introduced on a trial basis before deciding on more ambitious reforms.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Many of the six generous proposals, digital registry, self mandates, charter and clearance resolutions, streamlined reports and meetings, expiry clauses to avoid man that's continuing indefinitely and stronger accountability for results are all practical measures that could reduce duplications, free up resources and strengthen the UN's impact.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: But let us also be absolutely honest.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Reform will not succeed if it is directed only at the Secretariat.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We, the Member States, must also change our own working methods.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We are the ones who adopt more and more resolutions, who request more reports, who create overlapping mandates and who too often instruct the UN to deliver within existing resources.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: These habits have made the UN larger, more complex and at times less efficient.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The 80th anniversary of the UN is an important chance to strengthen multilateralism and show our taxpayers that this organization can adapt, deliver and remain relevant to the challenges of today and tomorrow.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: To conclude, it is our responsibility to make the UN stronger and adaptable with changing times.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thailand stand ready to work with our delegations so that we can hand over a more coherent, effective and trusted UN for generations to come.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thank you very much for your kind attention.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I thank the Permanent Representative of the Thailand.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We would also like to align with the statement delivered by Iraq on behalf of the group of 77 and China and and coaches.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: In response to your guiding questions, I would like to offer the following suggestions.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: One, Our delegation could be flexible with the convening of one meeting per month for the remainder of this year, which should not clash with main Committee meetings.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Substantive negotiations, in our view, should commence in the next year.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Two, these meetings could be thematic dialogues, each focused on one of the three aspects of the SG's report.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Third, all three work streams are interlinked, particularly work streams two and three.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: However, we would not be in favor of considering any proposals emanating from work stream three in this Working Group unless the timeframe of the Working Group is reconsidered.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We also reiterate our request for a comprehensive report on the UNAT initiative at the earliest to ensure a better understanding of the purpose of this exercise and also to ensure coherence of our action.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Fourthly, the process from its outset must have transparent and inclusive modalities.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Specifically, we request that all written submissions received by the co facilitators be uploaded on a dedicated website and at the same time, actions taken by the Secretary General should also be shared with Member States.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Fifth, any decision or recommendation impacting existing mandates, particularly politically sensitive ones on which the concerned countries have reservations, should not be adopted until consensus is achieved and their concerns are adequately addressed.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: As you also noted, the clear directive of the assembly to strive for consensus on the question of how to approach the exercise.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We believe that the proposed thematic dialogues must be accompanied with robust data and briefings by the Secretariat.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Preliminarily, the Secretariat should provide a detailed and interactive briefing on the Mandate Registry, including an update on its status and methodology, should inform Member States about the implementation status of each mandate contained in the Registry and should undertake further work and analysis to identify actual duplications coaches.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: In conclusion, we believe this informal Working Group should negotiate a short resolution encouraging Member States to undertake steps that may help achieve the goals underlined in the SG's report recommendations.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Our full statement is being submitted in writing.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I thank you.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And we thank you for your willingness to guide us through this important and difficult process.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: It sounds like a very technical discussion, but at the end, of course, it is a very political one.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We're talking about the future of our organization, and we want to see a process at the end of which this organization comes out leaner, stronger, and more productive and focused on all three pillars of the work of the UN Equally.

text: I think it's important to emphasize that failure here cannot be an option.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And that's the one opportunity that we have to put the organization on the foundation that it needs to be successful in the next.

session_title: First meeting of the working group

text: We also believe that High Level Week is very, very important for us to put this on the agenda of our principles where it has not, I think, arrived in all cases.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I hope we will use the opportunities that we have and that we will also have many of our leaders actually address this in their speeches in the general debate.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: On your guiding questions that I find very helpful on how to.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: How to organize our discussions as productively and constructively as possible.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We do believe early scheduling is very helpful.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We also believe that what you have done for today is extremely helpful, namely give us guiding questions.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And then, of course, it's up to us to take them up and to.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And to respond to them.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We do, of course, share the sensitivities that others have mentioned with respect to the capabilities of small states.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We are one of the smallest members of the United Nations.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: At the same time, I do hope that all of us, and I think all of us also at the level of PRs, are committed to this process and to dedicate the time that will be necessary to make this success.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I think the reality of our calendars is, is that there is almost no date that does not have a meeting of a main committee.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: So we would encourage you to choose dates that are taken up with more routine work in the committees where we typically are not present as PRs or not automatically.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And we also encourage you to have a combination of very informal conversations outside of the setting that we find ourselves in today, but also meet here regularly so everybody is on the same page and inclusivity and transparency is fully guaranteed.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: So we're certainly committed, and I am committed personally to attending these meetings and to working with your guidance.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: On the last question, of course, and others have said that before.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We have tried this before and we have not done very well.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: So the first lesson for us certainly is that we should do it differently than we have done it in the past and really focus on the fact that this is a mandate implementation review report that, in our view, must, you know, be focused on and be founded on having agreed parameters for beginning reviewing internal terminating of mandates and that we can apply these principles then accordingly and turn them into the action that we are all looking for and that we will actually really be needing.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: There are three work streams.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: For us it's very clear that your mandate is Work Stream 2 and for us it is also very, very clear that the success, the atmosphere and the outcomes of this process will be decisive for the success that we can have in the other work streams.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Mr. Cocchia, let me begin by congratulating you and and the Permanent Representative of New Zealand on your appointment as Co Chairs of the informal Ad Hoc Working Group India aligns with the statement delivered by Iraq on behalf of G7 China.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Allow me to make following additional points in my national capacity.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: First, for the UNAT to be effective and impactful, it needs to be recognized that all three work streams are interlinked and therefore the scope of the Ad hoc Working Group should cover the entire life cycle of mandates, including creation, delivery and review across all three work streams.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Second, scope of the Working Group must cover all mandates emanating from General Assembly, Security Council, ECOSOC and Human Rights Council.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Third, strengthening the effectiveness and impact of the Development Plan should be accorded top priority under unat.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Further, under the Development Pillar, specialized knowledge and expertise of UN entities which cater to specific context and developmental needs of countries in the Global south must be preserved.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Fourth, taking into consideration the lesson learned of the past review processes, it is important that the Working Group should focus on principles rather than look into the merit of individual mandates.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: In addition to the inclusive trust, transparent and intergovernmental nature of negotiations under unat, the work stream too should be guided by broad principles such as reducing the periodicity of reports, mechanisms and processes incorporating sunset clause while creating and renewing mandates undertaking mandate review by utilizing AI tools with focus on the impact of mandate implementation and avoiding duplication between implementing entities.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Fifth, we encourage adoption of a flexible program of work of the Working Group that allows for meaningful and widest possible participation of Member State during the main segment of the 80th session.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: On the way forward, Mr. Kochi, the Secretary can provide an early presentation on the lesson learned from the previous mandate review exercise and consider developing necessary AI tools to identify duplication and carry out mandate review process across the mandate landscape.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The CO Chairs may wish to share their Working Work Plan take into consideration the intensive agenda of the main Committees ahead.

text: In conclusion, Mr. Co Chair India stand ready to engage constructively and support the Co Chairs in this process.

text: I thank you.

text: Allow me to add some remarks in our national capacity.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: As we all are aware, the different layers of change motivated by the UN Initiative offer us a unique opportunity to strengthen the United Nations.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The in depth analysis of the creation, delivery and review of mandates is central to this effort.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: For Portugal, a more coherent and predictable mandate cycle supported by clear guiding principles is essential to enhance the credibility and effectiveness of the organization.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We are convinced that mandates should be crafted with stronger results, orientation, informed by evidence and aligned with the resources available.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: A more systematic review mechanism and a set of guiding principles would also help us identify what works, what needs adjustment and how to ensure continuity when mandates evolve or over time.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: In this regard, the role of the Secretariat will be critical during this process in providing the necessary expertise, analysis and lessons learned.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: This discussion is also linked to the challenges ahead relating to work stream one.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We must be clear.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Efficiency gains cannot be a substitute for adequate resources, but they can and must help us to deliver better with what we have.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Portugal believes that the work streams 1 and 2 mutually reinforce efficiency in UN functioning and are a precondition for effective mandates and sound mandates are the foundation for efficiency in delivery.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: It is also important to address the broader budgetary context.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The revised SEMAT is for the the 26 budget exercise this year with singular characteristics underscore the difficult balance between ambition and affordability.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Portugal is ready to engage constructively in discussions and how to ensure that mandates are both impactful and realistically resourced so that expectations and implementation remain aligned.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Mr. Cocher, Portugal stands ready to work with all delegations to ensure that this process delivers tangible improvements.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: More than ever, Member States should try to be flexible during the negotiation process and show solidarity with the UN principles.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Let us make the UN initiative a turning point that strengths multilateralism equips the United nations to face the challenges ahead and better deliver to the people it serves.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thank you very much.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I thank the distinguished representative of Portugal.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I give the floor now to the distinguished representative of Mexico and then the United Kingdom.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Mr. Ryder, distinguished CO Chairs from New Zealand and Jamaica, allow me to extend my congratulations on your appointment to lead the efforts of this working group.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Mandates guide our collective action.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Reviewing them with both prudence and boldness is an imperative.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We cannot overlook.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The magnitude of this challenge calls for vision and statesmanship.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Mexico aspires for the mandate's review to be pragmatic, inclusive and grounded in consensus.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: A systemic approach is essential if we are to overcome fragmentation and strengthen the coherence of the organization's actions.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Allow me to share a number of considerations that Mexico deems relevant for the process ahead, taking into consideration the three guiding questions provided this process must reinforce the UN's leadership across its three fundamental peace and security, development and human rights, while safeguarding the balance among them and consistently guided by the purposes of and principles enshrined in the Charter of the un.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The mandates review should enhance coherence across the whole entire UN system, including mandates that go beyond the scope of the Secretariat for funds, programs, specialized agencies and other entities.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: It will be essential to promote dialogue within their respective governing bodies and to replicate this process across locations and levels of the system in order to prevent fragmentation and duplication.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The review of mandates must be understood as a core element of a broader, comprehensive and ambitious reform, not as an isolated or gradual technical exercise.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The goal is to transform the organization into a more effective, legitimate and results driven instrument.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: On the ground, the process must be guided by a clear and streamlined methodology underpinned by a forward looking vision that anticipates and avoids costly adjustments.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: It will be essential to design and implement targeted, systematic evaluation mechanisms that allow us to assess the relevance, validity and need of mandates, including, where appropriate, recommendations for determination in view of their fulfillment of solacence or redundancy.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Adjustments to the periodicity of reviews, for instance, shifting from annual to biennial or triennial cycles, should also be considered to ensure a coherent, orderly and sustainable process over time.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And the process must aim to deliver tangible, high impact results supported by efficient working methods, clear timelines and periodic evaluation mechanisms.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The process must be guided by pragmatism, inclusiveness and openness, with transparency and legitimacy ensuring a collective sense of ownership and finally, an active role for the Secretariat.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The Secretariat must play a proactive role by providing timely, relevant information and specialized technical support to the Working Group.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: This will be key to fostering a solid, well informed and effective deliberative process and to achieve concrete and implementable results.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I thank you.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I thank the distinguished representative of Mexico.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I give the floor now to the distinguished representative of the United Kingdom, to be followed by Norway.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The UK welcomes the appointment of the CO Chairs for this ad hoc working group and thanks them for their efforts to date and in advance for the hard work that is to come.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Given the short duration for this Working Group, we need to be focused on what we want to collectively achieve and in that regard, appreciate what Ambassador Wallace noted about the importance of an inclusive and transparent approach.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: To that I would add the value of evidence and so welcome the fact that there will be a discovery phase at the start of this process.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: From a UK perspective, we think it would be helpful for this Working Group to focus on the following three areas.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: First, we should develop a set of principles for the preparation of future mandates.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The Secretary General set out a number of these in his report, such as the Secretariat providing more information in advance of any negotiation and increased budget transparency, both of which we would support in principle.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The UK would also support shorter texts with fewer meetings and reports, commissioned and more comprehensive review clauses.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And we welcome and appreciate USG Rider's update on these issues as well.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Second, we should develop a common framework for how we will organize our work.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We need to ensure we have clear parameters for how we review the implementation of the thousands of mandates we face as we go forward.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: With support from the Secretariat and using the new UN Mandate Source Registry, we should categorize mandates according to which of the UN's three pillars they support, their authorizing bodies and their funding modalities, and consider these factors in how we take our work forward.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Third, it is essential that the Working Group makes tangible early progress on reviewing areas of duplication and unhelpful overlap.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: As a starting point, we we should request the Secretariat to provide information on the wealth of reports that are provided each year.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: This could be a meaningful data set for the Group to review and propose rationalization.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We hope that within these six months we can both agree the principles to apply to future and previous mandates, as well as agree some concrete, tangible outcomes which will support the UN AT process.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We look forward to the discussions and to working alongside the co facilitators and other Member States to advance this important strand of the UNHC process.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thank you.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I thank the distinguished representative of the United Kingdom.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I give the floor now to the distinguished representative of Norway, to be followed by Zimbabwe.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thank you.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thank you so much.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Co Chairs and first of all, a warm congratulations to both of you on your appointment to chair this informal group and also to shepherd this mandate implementation review process.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: You have our full support and confidence in the job and the duties you take on.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Norway will engage actively and constructively to achieve solutions and also practical results that lead to a more effective un.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Let me just quickly emphasize three main points.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: First, let me stress that the SG report on Mandate Implementation Review serves as a very helpful entry point for us as Member States and in the negotiation process because it expands the scope of the concept of mandate implementation by including both the design or the creation phase and also the review phase of implementation of the mandates.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And most importantly, it advances a perspective on systemic improvements by focusing on some key guiding principles, uninformed options.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: As part of that, I'm stressing this because we will support from our side a process that is forward looking and which has a broad scope, setting a new standard for mandate creation, implementation and review and the methodology for that.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Our key goal for this phase should therefore be to agree on some of these guiding principles that will have a positive and very concrete impact on the future design of mandates and the life cycles of the mandates, which collectively can help us together to address what is today the structural problem, and that's the propitiation of overlapping and duplicative mandates.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: My second key point, and that's briefly on your three guiding questions.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I mean very many good constructive ideas have been raised in the meeting.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I think from our side we just want to say that we believe it's crucial to combine two sets of key elements in this first is to ensure inclusivity throughout the process and that's first and foremost related to us as Member States.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: So all Member States must be enabled and able to participate full.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: So it has to be transparent.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: But it also has to involve a very significant support role, not by Guy Ryder himself, but his very well staffed team and the Secretariat throughout all the stages by providing what he also stressed is substantive support.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The second element is clearly to secure, and we don't have yet any strong opinions whether it needs by nature to be sequential or whether things could be mixed throughout the process.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: But what is key for us is that we must be able to secure a process where both the informal part of negotiations are sufficiently that you as co chairs, sufficiently allow time for that phase.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: But secondly, and maybe most importantly is to ensure deep thematic, substantive discussions before going into the nitty gritty details of text based negotiations.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And in that phase, clearly the role of the Secretariat must be protected and supported.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thirdly, and finally, we as Norway remain very committed to engage with all, I mean with you, but of course with all Member States both across and within regional groups.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: And we like both very constructively and creatively to contribute to a truly collective process that must be collective if we're going to succeed by finding an area of convergence and consensus at the end finally, for us it will be vital to find the right balance between all the three main pillars in this work and it cannot be any cherry picking and all three will count as most importantly vis a vis each other.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: So with those words, thank you and we're looking forward.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: I thank the distinguished representative of Norway.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Give the floor now to the distinguished representative of Zimbabwe who will be followed by Trinidad and Tobago.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Thank you coaches.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Let me begin by congratulating you Ambassador Wallace and Ambassador Shualga on your appointment as Co Chairs of this informal ad hoc Working Group.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: You can be assured of Zimbabwe's full support.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: My delegation aligns itself with a statement that was delivered on behalf of the G77 in China and the African Group and I will share the following perspectives in my national capacity in response to the guiding questions, Zimbabwe have used this ADWOC Working Group as a critical component of the UN80 initiative which should provide an open, transparent and inclusive platform for the mandate implementation review.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The ADWERK Working Group is however working within a constrained timeframe and this calls for maximum collaboration, flexibility and ultimately consensus.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: The report by the Secretary General outlines three areas of mandates life cycle creation, delivery and review.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: My delegation wishes to propose that the work of the ADWERK Working Group should consequently follow a thematic approach based on these three areas.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: We further propose the compilation of a roadmap of activities of the Working Group.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
text: Central to this roadmap would be an elements paper prepared by the CO chairs based on the three focus areas and the Secretary General's recommendations.

session_title: First meeting of the working group
